name: IDEAL Electrical 61-657 - Dual Range 12-1000V AC NCVT with Flashlight
short_description: Dual Range 12 to 1000V AC NCVT w/Flashlight
UL Certified CAT IV 1000V AC, 12-1000 V AC Low Range, 50 to 1000 V AC High Range

Senses 2 voltage ranges 12 to 1000V AC (Low ) or 50 to 1000V AC (High) allowing detection of low voltages (doorbells, thermostats, irrigation wiring, etc.) and standard voltage in tamper-resistant outlets when the tip is located near the Hot receptacle and/or Hot Connection point on the outlet
Dust Tight and Water proof (1 m for 30 minutes) Industrial Design makes this tester easy to grip and capable of sustaining a drop from 6.5 ft (2 m)

An LED Flashlight in the tip operates independently of the tester functions and can be used to illuminate the work area. Press the Flashlight Button to turn it On/Off. The tester is set to Flashlight Off. The Flashlight will Auto Power Off after 5 minutes

name: Klein Tools RT250 GFCI Outlet Tester with LCD Display, Electric Voltage Tester for Standard 3-Wire 120V Electrical Receptacles
short_description: CLEAR LCD READOUT: GFCI Receptacle Tester features a large backlit LCD readout for easy voltage reading and clear indication of wiring conditions
TRIP TIME DISPLAY: LCD readout shows the time required to trip a GFCI device, allowing for quick and accurate troubleshooting
DETECT COMMON WIRING FAULTS: Detect and identify common wiring faults, ensuring electrical safety and proper functionality of GFCI receptacles
PATENT-PENDING OPEN NEUTRAL & OPEN GROUND DETECTION: Innovative detection system identifies Open Neutral and Open Ground wiring faults, enhancing safety measures
CONVENIENT AUTO-HOLD FEATURE: Auto-Hold function holds the reading for hard-to-reach outlets, providing convenience and ease of use
VISIBLE LED INDICATORS: Bright green and red LEDs illuminate to provide clear visual indicators of wiring conditions, making it easy to identify issues
CAT II 135V SAFETY RATING: GFCI Receptacle Tester has a CAT II 135V safety rating, ensuring reliable and safe electrical testing for various applications
product_description: The RT250 is an electrical receptacle tester that tests the wiring conditions at an electrical outlet and inspects GFCI devices. The LCD displays the voltage, identifies the wiring fault, and the time required to trip a GFCI device. It is designated for use with North American 3-wire 120V electrical outlets. name: Klein Tools NCVT2P Dual Range, Non-Contact Voltage Tester, 12-1000V AC, Visual and Audible Indicators, Auto Power Off
short_description: DUAL-RANGE DETECTION: Select voltage range of 12-1000V, or 70-1000V for targeted voltage detection
VISUAL AND AUDIBLE INDICATORS: The electrical voltage tester provides simultaneous visual and audible indicators to easily and accurately detect the presence of voltage

VERSATILE APPLICATIONS: With non-contact detection, the tester can be used for various low-voltage or standard voltage applications in security, entertainment, communications, environmental control, and irrigation systems
CLEAR INDICATION: A green light indicator signifies the absence of voltage, providing a clear visual indication for safe operations
PORTABLE AND CONVENIENT: The lightweight and compact design, along with a pocket clip, allows for easy storage and quick access to the voltage tester whenever needed
AUTO POWER-OFF FEATURE: The auto power-off feature helps conserve and extend the battery life of the voltage tester, ensuring long-lasting functionality
HIGH SAFETY RATING: With a CAT IV 1000 V rating, the voltage tester offers expanded operation capabilities and provides enhanced protection for electrical testing in various environments
product_description: The NCVT-2P is a non-contact voltage tester that detects 12 to 1000V AC and indicates the presence of voltage in cables, cords, circuit breakers, light fixtures, switches, outlets and wires as well as AC voltage in doorbells, thermostats, low voltage lighting and irrigation systems. Includes both visual and audible signals. The NCVT-2P is rugged enough for any job site. name: Neoteck 2 in 1 Pen Type Digital Multimeter Non-Contact Voltage Tester 6000 Counts Intelligent Multimeter with LCD Display for AC/DC Voltage Resistance Diode Continuity Capacitance Frequency
short_description: 【2 in 1 Multifunctional Multimeter】This voltage tester is a tool that combines the functions of voltage tester pen and digital multimeter.It not only can effortlessly measures AC/DC voltage, resistance, diode, continuity, capacitance and frequency, but also has functions of NCV and null/live wire detection. (Note: The voltage tester pen mode exclusively measures AC voltage, while the multimeter mode detects both AC and DC voltages.)

【Intelligent Operation】Neoteck smart multimeter can automatically and intelligently identify measurement targets (AC/DC voltage, resistance, continuity) without the need for changing modes, which makes it incredibly convenient and easy to use.Besides, it can distinguishes the null wire and fire wire by different alarm frequencies.

【High Accuracy Measurements】Equipped with True RMS function, this 6000 counts multimeter (measurement range: 0.1mV to 600V in DC voltage; 10mV to 600V in AC voltage) is worthy of trust to provide precise readings for your electrical projects.It is widely used in schools, research institutes, factories, companies and other social areas.

【Safety First with CE CAT II 600V Standard】Neoteck Intelligent Multimeter strictly complies with the CE CAT II 600V standard, ensuring reliable and safe measurements. Besides, the tester pen's NCV function detects dangerous electrical voltages without direct contact, providing an extra layer of protection for users.（Note：Voltage Tester Pen Mode：CAT II 600V Satety Standard）

【Portable and Convenient Design】This voltage tester automatically shuts off after 15 minutes of inactivity, conserving energy and extending battery life(2 x 1.5V AAA batteries included).Besides, its compact size, built-in flashlight, pen clip and velvet pouch make it more convenient for you to operate in test work.

name: ANENG Voltage Tester with Screwdriver Electrical Tester Tool Non Contact Voltage Detector Dual Range AC 11V/30V-1000V,Live/Null Wire Electric Tester with LCD Display,Buzzer Alarm,Breakpoint Finder
short_description: 【Upgraded & Multifunction】ANENG B19 Voltage Tester is both a voltage detector equipped with clear LCD display shows real-time voltage readings for accuracy and safety. It also features dual-purpose screwdriver heads (crosshead and flathead) with magnetic bits,making it perfect for small repairs and installations. Ideal for electricians,DIYers,and home users,B19 combines voltage detection,screwdriver functionality, and clear digital readouts in one compact tool. A must-have for your toolbox.

【NCV with Dual Range】B19 Electric Pen Tester features non-contact voltage detection and supports dual AC voltage ranges: 30V–1000V/11V–450V, making it ideal for both low and high voltage applications. Accurately detects Live and Neutral wires. The LCD screen displays real-time voltage, frequency, and status,while the buzzer alarm and LCD indicators provide alerts for voltage presence and breakpoints. Perfect for home, industrial, and professional electrical work

【Troubleshooting Screwdrives】ANENG electric screwdriver features both crosshead and flathead dismantling capabilities with magnetic bits for added convenience. Each bit measures 4mm in diameter and 24mm in length, ideal for small repair and maintenance tasks. Integrated LCD for working in dim environments. Automatic shut-off saves battery life when not in use

【Enhanced Safety Design】Built with a smart chip, slip-resistant handle, and fully insulated body, the ANENG voltage tester pen ensures safe operation around electricity. Its compact, pocket-sized design makes it easy to carry and suitable for home, school, factory, or laboratory use.

【What You Get】Package includes 1*crosshead screwdriver pen and 1*flathead screwdriver pen. This versatile voltage tester and screwdriver combo offers both convenience and portability for your everyday testing and repair needs.

name: Voltage Tester, Non-Contact Voltage Detector, Electrical Tester, 3 Ranges AC 12V/48V/70V-1000V, Live/Null Wire Tester with Buzzer Alarm and Flashlight, Wire Breakpoint Finder - Orange
short_description: NCV: The Non-Contact Voltage Tester is equipped with NCV sensing probe, which provides you with the easiest and safest way to check the voltage in a wire, outlet, or switch. When it is close to an outlet or power cord, the voltage detector will emit different levels of alarm sounds and signal indicator lights to indicate the presence and strength of voltage

3 Sensitivity Modes: The live wire tester suits different voltage detection ranges. After powering on, it is in low sensitivity mode by default (buzzer 1 time), press "S" once to enter medium sensitivity mode (buzzer 2 times), and press "S" again to enter high sensitivity mode (buzzer 3 times)

Detection Light and Flashlight: Built-in detection light and tail flashlight bring you convenience when working in the dark, and can be used as an emergency light in emergencies. The tail flashlight can only be turned on when the tester is off

Compact Design: The pocket-sized electrical tester pen comes with a convenient pen hook that makes it easy to carry in your shirt pocket. When the battery voltage is lower than 2.5V, the power indicator flashes 3 times, and the buzzer buzzes and then automatically shuts off, please replace the battery in time. Automatic Power Off after 3 minutes without operation or signal detection

Widely Applicable: The circuit tester is suitable for checking circuit breakers, lighting fixtures, switches, and outlets, which is the safest way to check for electrical leakage. The electrical tester is perfect for professional testers, DIY users, hobbyists, and homeowners
